page.title: 18Events in Leeswood
page.content: On Saturday 13th of July 1985, Leeswood held its carnival on the Community Centre field at Phoenix Park.There was a magnificent parade with Morris Dancers,Jazz Bands and a Fancy Dress contest. Euryn Ogwen, a television producer who used to live in Leeswood, opened the carnival.There were many stalls and a fair. The fair caused some trouble in Leeswood because another fair appeared some weeks earlier and there was a lot of confusion and ill-feeling involved. Gala week held quite a number of events such as a disco on Thursday and a pram race where people dressed up with a pram and did an obstacle course around Leeswood and a slow bicycle race.Leeswood has an excellent carnival every year.
